name: Flashlight
description: A heavy-duty flashlight. Suspiciously light and never runs out of batteries.

name: Manhole Cover
description: Iron sewer manhole cover. Good for blocking. Better for bashing.

name: Revolver
description: Commonly known as the most powerful hand gun on Earth this .44 magnum six-round hand cannon will make short work of close enemies. It kicks like a raging mule.

name: Hunter's Rifle
description: Bolt action rifle good for precise long-range engagements.

name: Blood Bubbles
description: Demon blood that bubbles by itself. Toxic to anyone or anything that stands in it.

name: Homemade Flamethrower
description: Fire spews from a nozzle that incinerates anything unfortunate enough to be within close proximity. Spiders won't stand a chance.

name: Fireworks
description: Normally used to celebrate. Turn these into mid-range explosive solutions to demonic problems.

name: Hellfire Molotov
description: 1 parts glass 2 parts gasoline 1 part towel and 1 part Hellfire. These simple ingredients make short work of anything within throwing distance.
